word_mean: 心皮：单细胞雌蕊，或组成复合雌蕊或种皮的成分之一

sentence.Network_en: A flower may contain more than one carpel.
sentence.Network_cn: 一朵花可以有一个以上的心皮.

sentence.Network_en: Gynoecium ( pl . gynoecia ) The CARPEL or carpels of a flower.
sentence.Network_cn: 雌蕊群 ( 雌蕊 ):一朵花中由一个或多个心皮组成的结构.

sentence.Network_en: Carpel The female reproductive organ of a flowering plant.
sentence.Network_cn: 心皮:有花植物的雌性生殖器官.

花朵有五个雌蕊(carpel)，雄蕊通常 20 个，而李属的花朵大多只有一个雌蕊（所以苹果有五个种子，李、桃、樱桃等都只有一个)。开 …

list.abs: carpels 2 or 3 ( or 4 ) , free or weakly united , lobed ovary with as many locules as carpels ;心皮2或者3（或者4)，离生或稍合生，子房裂片与室和心皮同数；
ovule solitary in each carpel , basal , campylotropous ., 胚珠单生在每心皮 , 基部.
Follicle dehiscent ; mature carpels rostrate spine at base ., 成熟心皮基部具喙状刺.
pistil composed of 3 carpels ; ovary 1-loculed ; placentae parietal , bilamellate , lamellae branched or unbranched .由3心皮组成的雌蕊；子房1室；侧膜胎座，有两片，副花冠裂片分开或不分开。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French carpelle or modern Latin carpellum, from Greek karpos 'fruit'
